com.sencha.gxt.widget.core.client.form.error
Class ElementErrorHandler

java.lang.Object
  com.sencha.gxt.widget.core.client.form.error.ElementErrorHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
ErrorHandler
public class ElementErrorHandler
extends Object
implements ErrorHandler

A FieldError instance that calls setInnerHTML on a target element. The target element can be specified directly or via a element id.
